/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with trees, their leaves a vibrant green, standing tall and providing a canopy over the sidewalk. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in urban landscapes. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is bathed in natural light, enhancing the colors and bringing the scene to life.
